trans-unit.source: Option 2: Use the Azure Management Portal to apply Update 1
trans-unit.target: Option 2: Use the Azure Management Portal to apply Update 1

trans-unit.source: Explains how to use the Management Portal to install StorSimple 8000 Series Update 1.
trans-unit.target: Explains how to use the Management Portal to install StorSimple 8000 Series Update 1.

trans-unit.source: To install Update 1 from the Azure Management Portal
trans-unit.target: To install Update 1 from the Azure Management Portal

trans-unit.source: In the Management Portal, go to the **Devices** page and select your device.
trans-unit.target: In the Management Portal, go to the **Devices** page and select your device.

trans-unit.source: Under **Network Interfaces**, locate the network interface that has a gateway assigned.
trans-unit.target: Under **Network Interfaces**, locate the network interface that has a gateway assigned.

trans-unit.source: This will be a network interface other than DATA 0.
trans-unit.target: This will be a network interface other than DATA 0.

trans-unit.source: Note that because gateway settings are required on a cloud-enabled network interface, you will need to disable the cloud access for this interface to clear the setting.
trans-unit.target: Note that because gateway settings are required on a cloud-enabled network interface, you will need to disable the cloud access for this interface to clear the setting.

trans-unit.source: Repeat step 4 for any other network interface that has a gateway assigned (excluding DATA 0).
trans-unit.target: Repeat step 4 for any other network interface that has a gateway assigned (excluding DATA 0).

trans-unit.source: You can now [use the Management Portal to install Update 1](#use-the-management-portal-to-install-update-1).
trans-unit.target: You can now [use the Management Portal to install Update 1](#use-the-management-portal-to-install-update-1).
